ECU 请求包[51个字节]：APS1300051A101AAA0123456789012A10100000000000000END

EMA 确认包[52个字节]: APS1300052A100AAA0123456789012A100000000000000000END

/home/data/id
【A102】		OK  可以使用
上报逆变器ID
EMA A102包[51个字节]：APS1300051A101AAA0123456789012A10200000000000000END

ECU 回应包[62+22X]：APS1300106A102AAA012345678901210M1.0SAA--200200000000000000END2017032200010000000END2017031500010000000END!

/home/data/id
【A103】		OK	可以使用

EMA A103包[51个字节]：APS1300051A103AAA0123456789012000000000000000000END

ECU 回应包[52个字节]：APS1300052A100AAA0123456789012A103000000000000000END

/home/data/power	OK	可以使用
【A110】		echo("/home/data/power","201703150001,258,,,,1\n201703220001,258,,,,1\n")

ECU 回应包[]：APS1300052A100AAA0123456789012A110000000000000000END

EMA A110包[]单播：APS1300070A110AAA01234567890121000100000000000000END201703150001250END

ECU 回应包[]：APS1300052A100AAA0123456789012A110000000000000000END

/yuneng/ecu_flag.con
【A119】		OK 可以使用
设置 ecu 开关，1 正常通讯，0 只保持有轮询不再上报任何数据，ecu 默认是 1
EMA A119包[]：APS1300048A119AAA0123456789012000000000000001END

ECU 回应包[]： APS1300048A119AAA0123456789012000000000000000END
